extendedInfo.description: Worship and Praise Lyrics is brought to you by Eznetsoft SJ. It is a dedication to our Lord and Savior Jesus-Christ. This software is brought to the Christian community to help them Worship using the standard hymns. All the Great Songs for your daily Worship.  Over 2000+ Hymns Lyrics and counting.Book included in this release:Contemporary and Traditional Songs (English)Chants D'Esperance (Francais/Creole); Melodie Joyeuse (Francais/Creole)Reveillons-Nous (Francais/Creole)La Voix du ReveilleHaiti Chante Avec Radio LumiereEcho Des ElusAt EZnetSoft SJ, we are so happy to bring this wonderful App to you. This is our hope that this will facilitate your worship to the Lord. We have tried our best to bring most of all the public domain traditional songs to you. The songs are in French, English and Creole divided in Books. We hope that you will enjoy this version and any future versions to come.Features Worth mentioning:-Offline access to hundreds of the Traditional Songs (English, French and Creole)-Add to Favorites: you have the ability to select individual songs you like and add them to your Favorites List.-Sort the Song List of a particular book alphabetically or by numbers.-Email of Song Lyric to yourself. You can take advantage of our growing database to email Lyrics to yourself right from our App.We appreciate your feedback.

reviews.author: Florentina Kissoon

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Very well made worship App. I Love its simplicity. You can find the lyric for the song in seconds. I recommend it.
reviews.author: Ginelle Francois

reviews.title: No way to search
reviews.comment: You have an \"X\" in the place where \"go\" or \"enter\" or \"search\" should be. U already have a back arrow if u wanted to take off the search bar. What is the point in having two ways to go back and zero ways to go forward!?!? Please fix this!! Other than that, I just downloaded this and haven\'t seen much yet, but the parts I saw I liked.
reviews.author: Ash K

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: I really love this app,thank you. Que Dieu te benisse! May God bless you!
reviews.author: Mirlande Adrien

reviews.title: Super!
reviews.comment: Great job! well done! I will try the apps when I do praise and worship. May God continue to bless this ministry for the benefits of the saints. Who can ask for more?
reviews.author: Maude S.Pierre

reviews.title: Wonderful apps
reviews.comment: Wonderful tool to have as a Christian and as an inspired singer. Good job EZnetsoft/SJ

reviews.comment: Great app I love it!!!!!! .

reviews.title: Awsome App. I recommend this
reviews.comment: Every christians should have this App. Well made... plenty of christian song lyrics that we sing every Sunday.  Tell you congregation.
reviews.author: Brunel Etienne

reviews.title: Perfectly suited for all
reviews.comment: This is the first app that has the hymns that we sing in church and at revivals. Now I can really sing the correct words instead of mouthing them. I have a great Baritone voice, and I\'m not afraid to use it (now).
reviews.author: Nathaniel M Gray Jr

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: One program that makes my device indispensable.  No more carrying around printed lyrics as I travel.  Blessings!
